![Unlock DAO Call Newsletter | October 7, 2025](https://storage.googleapis.com/papyrus_images/35eedd007b409aca1b06ac4b55b7643db1e57cfc8b103a2cc2c4a327d79b1255.jpg)

<h2 id="h-hey-locksmiths" class="text-3xl font-header !mt-8 !mb-4 first:!mt-0 first:!mb-0"><strong>Hey Locksmiths!</strong></h2><p>Unlock DAO enters October with an energized pulse where creators, builders, and community organizers  are abuzz with new experiments and collaborative initiatives. As headlines swirl about potential shakeups in the creator economy, our commitment to decentralized creativity and open collaboration grows even stronger. </p><p>In a landscape shifting beneath the feet of platforms and audiences alike, our DAO continues to put creators first, prioritizing transparency and the open internet. October carries out many of these promises, with our <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://scoutgame.com/">Scout Game</a> x <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://x.com/ethereumbo">Ethereum Bolivia</a> collaboration, the support of the Latina Blockchain Hackathon organized by&nbsp;<a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://www.youtube.com/@hiwomenbiz">HiWomenBiz,&nbsp;</a>and our marketing initiative with the&nbsp;<a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://www.youtube.com/@theriseupmorningshow">Rise Up Morning Show</a>.</p><p>But for now, let me summarize for you what has been on our minds over the past month:</p><hr><h2 id="h-core-team-updates" class="text-3xl font-header !mt-8 !mb-4 first:!mt-0 first:!mb-0"><strong>Core Team Updates</strong></h2><p><a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow" class="dont-break-out graf markup--anchor markup--anchor-readOnly" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/juliengenestoux/"><strong>Julien</strong></a> provided us with the Core Team Updates of last month:</p><ul><li><p>Julien acknowledged a busy period; several planned initiatives remain in progress, particularly around fee collection mechanisms and ongoing investor conversations related to token distributions. The team is committed to continually refining and improving the protocol.</p></li></ul><br><h2 id="h-operations-and-coordination" class="text-3xl font-header !mt-8 !mb-4 first:!mt-0 first:!mb-0"><strong>Operations and Coordination</strong></h2><ul><li><p><strong>ScoutGame x Ethereum Bolivia x Unlock</strong><br>Collaborations on internal GitHub labeling and bounty allocation are nearly finalized, with discussions focused on fair prize amounts and budget allocation for the three initial bounty tiers.</p></li><li><p><strong>Chain Conversations</strong><br><a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/decentralizing/">Kara</a> and I continue our conversations with chains on active integrations and marketing collaborations. Currently, Starknet, Stellar, Rari Chain, and Unichain have our focus when it comes to novel integrations, while Scroll and CELO are on our agenda for a revival initiative. <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/kalu-vincent-704896192/">GozmanGonzales</a> might be able to help us with the chain reactivation regarding Scroll.</p></li><li><p><strong>Moving Collaborative Working</strong><br>Decision made to move some operational tools and internal documentation from the Charmverse platform to pinned messages in Discord and Google Drive, with a focus on maintaining accessibility for all working group members and providing financial relief.</p></li><li><p><strong>Latina Blockchain Hackathon by </strong><a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://en.hiwomenbiz.com/"><strong>HiWomenBiz</strong></a><br>This week, the Latina Blockchain Hackathon is in full swing, with one&nbsp;<a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cczwW97CVxA">introductory presentation</a>&nbsp;I gave yesterday and more technical workshops that <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/dannithomx/">Danni</a> will be conducting today and tomorrow for the young, mostly female hackers. If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to contact <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow" class="dont-break-out graf markup--anchor markup--anchor-readOnly" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/lilian-santos-mart%C3%ADnez/"><strong>Lilipop.eth</strong></a><strong> </strong>directly.</p><figure float="none" data-type="figure" class="img-center" style="max-width: null;"><a href="https://x.com/HiWomenbiz/status/1975705308757467556/photo/1" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" style="cursor: pointer;"><img src="/images/blog/unlock-dao-call-newsletter---october-7--2025/66ed63ce30a765a38c65613d8d921142a4a95f1218e1035251f475e004c1db08.png" blurdataurl="data:image/png;base64," nextheight="664" nextwidth="1280" class="image-node embed"></a><figcaption htmlattributes="[object Object]" class="hide-figcaption"></figcaption></figure></li></ul><br><h2 id="h-finances-and-resources" class="text-3xl font-header !mt-8 !mb-4 first:!mt-0 first:!mb-0"><strong>Finances &amp; Resources</strong></h2><ul><li><p><strong>Financial Reporting &amp; Projections</strong><br><a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/andreumontpascual/">Andreu</a> is developing a dashboard to consolidate and clarify revenue sources, including the 1% protocol fee and Unlock Prime subscriptions, to improve tracking and transparency. In the future, it will include sales of merchandise and more.</p></li><li><p><strong>Gitcoin Grants Application</strong><br>I will be applying this week for the Gitcoin Grants round with a focus on Infrastructure, and I encouraged our latest community member, TheDesignIconoclast, to do the same for his idea to integrate EAS into Unlock Protocol.</p></li><li><p><strong>Cross-Community Liquidity Pools</strong><br>Discussions took place regarding potential liquidity pools with external tokens, with next steps involving a lightweight proposal forum thread and further research by <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/jeeltcraft/">Jilt</a>.</p></li></ul><br><h2 id="h-member-relations-and-governance" class="text-3xl font-header !mt-8 !mb-4 first:!mt-0 first:!mb-0"><strong>Member Relations &amp; Governance</strong></h2><ul><li><p><strong>Ambassador Program WIP</strong><br>Thanks to DAO member <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/anupadasgupta/">Anupa</a>, we are making steady progress on the final version of the ambassador program. This and the following week will be all about organizing the data. On that note, we now have Unlock Protocol screen backgrounds. Download <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1PFMMK0fr6Jp7oeI8YepW32cNELw689k9?usp=sharing">here</a>.</p></li><li><p><strong>Our Community Dashboard</strong><br>The dashboard design is almost concluded, and we will be able to revise it next week together with its leading developers, <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/asman-malika-84981a211/">Malika</a> and <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/louis-asingizwe-023588335/">Louis</a>. Check the current status out <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow" class="dont-break-out graf markup--anchor markup--anchor-readOnly" href="https://unlock.degov.ai/"><strong>here</strong></a>.</p></li><li><p><strong>Community Spotlight | Danny Thomx</strong><br>A <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://paragraph.com/@unlockprotocol/community-spotlight-or-danny-thomx">written community spotlight</a> about our Steward for Technology &amp; Innovation was also published last month. If you didn't already get a chance, check it out and follow <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/dannithomx/">Danny</a> and his amazing projects via socials!</p></li><li><p><strong>Community Spotlight | snax.eth from PizzaDAO</strong><br>Unlock DAO Member <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/william-torbet/">WillT</a> had the pleasure of interviewing <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://x.com/snack_man">snax.eth</a>, the co-founder of <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://x.com/Pizza_DAO">PizzaDAO</a> in our most recent community spotlight livestream. He spills tea on humble beginnings and more experimental use cases built on Unlock Protocol. Check out the livestream recording <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aRZHXMBLFbo&amp;t=35s">here</a>.</p></li><li><p><strong>Crypto Cultura x Unlock</strong><br>Our latest use case has been inspired by Crypto Cultura, a Web3 centric art festival held in Lima, Peru. Organizers include <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://pe.linkedin.com/company/cryptoamigos">Cryptoamigos</a> and <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://x.com/Art3Hub">Art3 Hub</a>. <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://farcaster.xyz/ivannalen">Ivanna</a>, part of their team approached us and we created an event that serves simultanously as an ongoing financial support campaign so the project can evolve over time and with the help of their community. Check it out <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://app.unlock-protocol.com/event/crypto-cultura-2025-supporter-campaign">here</a>.</p><figure float="none" data-type="figure" class="img-center" style="max-width: null;"><a href="https://app.unlock-protocol.com/event/crypto-cultura-2025-supporter-campaign" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" style="cursor: pointer;"><img src="/images/blog/unlock-dao-call-newsletter---october-7--2025/30ff816c2d7826cae328e7358545008cca6065e50785dd2bf1971f17f8e4b052.png" blurdataurl="data:image/png;base64," nextheight="1080" nextwidth="1080" class="image-node embed"></a><figcaption htmlattributes="[object Object]" class="hide-figcaption"></figcaption></figure></li></ul><br><h2 id="h-marketing-and-communications" class="text-3xl font-header !mt-8 !mb-4 first:!mt-0 first:!mb-0"><strong>Marketing &amp; Communications</strong></h2><ul><li><p><strong>Social Media Growth Report</strong><br><a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/cecilia-contreras-castro/">Ceci</a> showed the current status of our Google Analytics dashboard to showcase overall traction to the protocol and its website has increased over the past few months. We also added this very Paragraph page to the GA Dashboard and keep evolving our analytics measures.</p></li><li><p><strong>Rise Up Morning Show</strong> <br>The proposal to collaborate for three months with the Rise Up Morning Show has been approved by the DAO. Next steps are being organized with the team of <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://x.com/RUMSHQ">RUMS</a>. Stay tuned for more updates in the Marketing &amp; Communications working group channel on the Unlock Discord.</p></li></ul><br><h2 id="h-technology-and-innovation" class="text-3xl font-header !mt-8 !mb-4 first:!mt-0 first:!mb-0"><strong>Technology &amp; Innovation</strong></h2><ul><li><p><strong>Review of Stereum Pay Integrations</strong><br><a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/dannithomx/">Danny</a> had a meeting together with fellow stewards with the founder of Stereum Pay, a Bolivian start-up that offers QR code enabled payments that include also native fiat payments. More info to be expected in the coming weeks.</p></li></ul><br><h2 id="h-this-weeks-action-items" class="text-3xl font-header !mt-8 !mb-4 first:!mt-0 first:!mb-0"><strong>This Week's Action Items</strong></h2><p><strong>Here’s how you can get involved this week and prepare for the discussions coming up next week:</strong></p><ol><li><p>Vote on our onchain proposals via <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow" class="dont-break-out graf markup--anchor markup--anchor-readOnly" href="https://www.tally.xyz/gov/unlock-protocol"><strong>Tally</strong></a> or <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow" class="dont-break-out graf markup--anchor markup--anchor-readOnly" href="https://unlock.degov.ai/"><strong>degov</strong></a>.</p></li><li><p>Review the following topics to add to the discussion call next week:<br>- <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://discord.com/channels/462280183425138719/1425207496984760461">Onchain Creator Rally</a><br>- <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" class="dont-break-out" href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HJxPPkzA_xA">Become a Social Media Content Contributor</a></p></li><li><p>Get $UP token and become an active contributor via the ApeBond campaign <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow" class="dont-break-out graf markup--anchor markup--anchor-readOnly" href="https://www.ape.bond/bonds/0x7933424992FF4F73050ba96E3cCbFC7296853d61/8453"><strong>here</strong></a>.</p></li><li><p>If you are an Unlock Community Member, don't hesitate to&nbsp;<a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://app.deform.cc/form/5ccdfd5d-5907-4711-bd12-4d7b6cc277a2">fill out our spotlight form</a>&nbsp;here so we can shed some light on what you are building on and with the protocol.</p></li><li><p>Share our social media posts and engage with campaigns across <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow" class="dont-break-out graf markup--anchor markup--anchor-readOnly" href="https://x.com/UnlockProtocol"><strong>X</strong></a>, <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow" class="dont-break-out graf markup--anchor markup--anchor-readOnly" href="https://www.tiktok.com/@unlock.dao?_t=ZT-8sqNLXE6lfn&amp;_r=1"><strong>TikTok</strong></a>—let's amplify our message together!</p></li></ol><br><p>Make some noise out there—let’s make sure the world hears about what we’re building with Unlock Protocol! Every post, share, and community conversation brings new creators into our decentralized ecosystem and strengthens our collective vision. </p><p>Because Unlock is free and open source, everything we build directly benefits you, the user. Unlock empowers us as individuals to take control, create, and connect without barriers. Your voice shapes the future of open access—let’s show everyone what Unlock can do for all of us.</p><h2 id="h-stay-unlocked" class="text-3xl font-header !mt-8 !mb-4 first:!mt-0 first:!mb-0"><strong>Stay Unlocked!</strong></h2><p>Sincerely,<br>Stella <span data-name="sparkles" class="emoji" data-type="emoji">✨</span></p><p>Your Steward for Operations &amp; Coordination</p><hr><h2 id="h-join-us" class="text-3xl font-header !mt-8 !mb-4 first:!mt-0 first:!mb-0"><strong>Join Us</strong></h2><ul><li><p><a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow" class="dont-break-out graf markup--anchor markup--anchor-readOnly" href="https://x.com/UnlockProtocol"><strong>X</strong></a></p></li><li><p><a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow" class="dont-break-out graf markup--anchor markup--anchor-readOnly" href="https://www.tiktok.com/@unlock.dao?_t=ZT-8sqNLXE6lfn&amp;_r=1"><strong>Tik Tok</strong></a></p></li><li><p><a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow" class="dont-break-out graf markup--anchor markup--anchor-readOnly" href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/unlock-protocol-dao/"><strong>LinkedIn</strong></a></p></li><li><p><a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow" class="dont-break-out graf markup--anchor markup--anchor-readOnly" href="https://www.youtube.com/@UnlockProtocol%20Farcaster%20Account%20%7C%20https://warpcast.com/unlock-protocol"><strong>YouTube</strong></a></p></li><li><p><a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow" class="dont-break-out graf markup--anchor markup--anchor-readOnly" href="https://farcaster.xyz/unlock-protocol"><strong>Farcaster</strong></a></p></li></ul><br>
